smoke_test_steps: 2. Verify that the page title is 'Test Login | Practice Test Automation'.
3. Check for the presence of the heading 'Test login'.
4. Verify that the username input field is displayed and enabled.
5. Verify that the password input field is displayed and enabled.
6. Check that the 'Submit' button is visible and enabled.
7. Verify the presence of the 'toggle-navigation' button.
8. Ensure that the 'HOME' link is present and directs to the correct URL.
9. Optionally, test the 'Submit' button to ensure it responds appropriately when clicked.
locator_strategies: Use 'id' to locate the username input field: #username
Use 'id' to locate the password input field: #password
Use 'class' to locate the submit button: .btn
Use 'id' to locate the toggle-navigation button: #toggle-navigation
title: Test Login | Practice Test Automation
